segments.text: What do you consider to be your strong points ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I ’ m tough not only physically but mentally .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been playing football since high school . At present , I ’ m a member of a community football club .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I practice every weekend with my teammates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . You must be tough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I never get tired . I think this comes from practicing football .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you consider to be your weak points ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Frankly speaking , I ’ m a typical Chinese workaholic . I don ’ t mind working late at night . Due to that , I tend to leave the office late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of people are you reluctant to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So far I haven ’ t met any particular kind . However , I may rule out those who prefer chatting to working .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you prefer to work alone or as part of a team ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on the type of work . Usually I prefer to work alone , because I ’ m self-motivated . But I can work either way . If necessary , I don ’ t hesitate to join the team .
segments.speaker: S2
